name: Bose Soundbar 500 for TV - Wireless - Bluetooth, Wi-Fi - Black  | Dell USA
description: This stylish soundbar is meant to be heard, not seen. That’s why we engineered custom-designed drivers to keep the Bose Soundbar 500 almost impossibly thin, without taking away from the acoustic excellence Bose is known for. Measuring only two inches high, its profile fits discreetly under your TV screen, so you won’t even know it’s there — until you hear it. And with Amazon Alexa built in, you won’t have to lift a finger.Like the Bose Soundbar 500, it’s the little things that make a big difference. It may be our thinnest soundbar yet, but its powerful acoustics fill the entire room with sound you just have to hear to believe.
